localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: This Week In Metaverse is a weekly newsletter delivering latest news from Metaverse world. We scan through important Metaverse developments and add all to a simple and fun to read 5mins email.
nodes.title: This Week In Metaverse - Best updates and news from Metaverse in a 5 minutes e-mail.
nodes.author: Petr Royce

nodes.excerpt: beehiiv empowers people to create, monetize, and grow by providing the most powerful and robust newsletter platform, holistically under one roof. We'll provide best-in-class tools to help you succeed, and you get to keep all of the revenue for yourself.
nodes.title: beehiiv - The most creator-friendly newsletter platform, period.
nodes.author: Tyler Denk

nodes.excerpt: Every Wednesday, receive a handpicked selection of tools made for Product Managers, Product Designers, UX Researchers and every member of the Product team.
nodes.title: Product Wednesday - A weekly selection of tools for Product teams
nodes.author: Saba Karim

nodes.excerpt: ğŸª¶ Papyrus is a new platform for creating blazing-fast, modern blogs and newsletters. Write using markdown, send posts directly to your subscriber's inboxes, and connect Stripe to start charging readers paid subscriptions for access your best posts.
nodes.title: Papyrus - Modern, blazing-fast, minimal blogging & newsletters
nodes.author: Colin Armstrong

nodes.excerpt: Each week, I spend 50+ hours on NFTs and I share the top news, stories, and discussions in a digestible email newsletter. No shilling, no price discussions...instead, I track the major developments in the space.
nodes.title: This Week in NFTs - The most complete NFT newsletter
nodes.author: Jan Sulek

nodes.excerpt: Pear helps makers, indie hackers and marketers grow faster- through a curated directory of email newsletters, podcasts and Patreon accounts which are actively seeking advertising sponsorship.
nodes.title: Pear 3.0 - Advertisers, find newsletter, podcast & Patreon creators
nodes.author: Kit Mackenzie

nodes.excerpt: A weekly newsletter for product managers to catch up on everything related to product management. You will find some good reads, book reviews, podcast recommendations, and a lot more. Join 3000+ PMs who enjoy Product Cafe.
nodes.title: The PM's Newsletter - Weekly Product Management newsletter read by 3000+ PMs
nodes.author: Prashant Mahajan

nodes.excerpt: Workspaces gives you a behind-the-scenes tour of the workspaces from inspiring creatives, designers, developers, entrepreneurs, etc. every week. Delivered to your inbox every Saturday and Sunday.
nodes.title: Workspaces Newsletter - Bringing you inside the workspaces of creative individuals
nodes.author: Ryan Gilbert

nodes.excerpt: Growth strategies and the weekly news from the best product-led SaaS companies (Figma, Calendly, Notion, and more) for founders and growth leaders! Delivered straight to your inboxes ğŸ’Œ
nodes.title: Top of the Lyne - The most exciting SaaS growth stories
nodes.author: Ali AbouelAtta

nodes.excerpt: Sideline Sprint is the most fun way to get the sports news you actually care about - think of it as Bleacher Report meets Morning Brew. Skimmable content that goes deeper than the headline, with a healthy dose of sports betting and humor thrown in.
nodes.title: Sideline Sprint 2.0 - Insightful, witty news for the busy sports fan
nodes.author: Nathan Baugh

nodes.excerpt: Weekly podcast recommendations, right in your inbox. Hand picked by the Team at Listnr Inc.
nodes.title: Podcatalyst Newsletter - Weekly podcast recommendations, right in your inbox
nodes.author: Ananay Batra

nodes.excerpt: What happens to your emails after you hit the "send" button? Find out in the first ever webcomic about email deliverabilityâ€”we promise you'll never look at your emails the same way again.
nodes.title: Postmark Express - The only webcomic about the Wild West of sending emails
nodes.author: fio

nodes.excerpt: Every weekday Noah Brier & Colin Nagy (and friends) send an email about something interesting. We try to keep things under 800 words and be explicit on just why the topic is interesting.
nodes.title: Why is this interesting? - A daily newsletter for the intellectually omnivorous.
nodes.author: Noah Brier

nodes.excerpt: Weekly advice, observations, and inspiration for engineering leaders. Especially relevant for those at high-growth startups and big tech.
nodes.title: The Pragmatic Engineer Newsletter - The #1 newsletter for tech leaders high-growth startups
nodes.author: Gergely Orosz

nodes.excerpt: Alphadrop is a daily newsletter delivering a community curated list of the top NFT drops. Its companion website makes it easy to create a calendar feed of saved drops. Alphadrop makes staying up-to-date with NFT drops very simple and easy.
nodes.title: Alphadrop - Community curated selection of the best NFT drops, daily
nodes.author: Brenden Mulligan

nodes.excerpt: Send Personalized Emails directly from your Gmail account using our G-Suite Add-on. You can send upto 600 emails using free Gmail account or upto 2000 emails using paid Google Workspace account You can track your email opens, bounces, etc.
nodes.title: Pigeon Mail - Send hundreds of personalised emails from Gmail
nodes.author: Jitesh Dugar

nodes.excerpt: Reply's Email Warm-Up tool provides effortless and swift deliverability boost using network of trusted accounts for peer-to-peer sending and fully automated positive engagement.
nodes.title: Email Warm-Up Tool by Reply - Make sure your emails land in the inbox, not spam
nodes.author: Oleg Campbell

nodes.excerpt: The world's largest curated collection of Creator Economy tools ğŸš€: - A growing database of 400+ creator tools - Filter by creator type or task - Curated library of the best creator economy content - Database regularly updated ğŸ‘‰ğŸ¼ https://www.creatorbase.xyz
nodes.title: Creatorbase - Discover the best tools and resources for creators

nodes.excerpt: Join over 6,045 makers: discover products that can help you ship and find users. Every Friday in your inbox. Free. No Ads.
nodes.title: Product Weekly Digest - 3 products for makers. Every friday in your inbox. Free.
nodes.author: Thomas Jacquesson

nodes.excerpt: Join 100+ Figmates seeking Resources, Jobs and a lot more surrounding Figma delivered to your inbox everyweek.
nodes.title: Figma Letters - Weekly Figma Newsletter with jobs, events, resources & more
